name: 2021 5th International Conference on Robotics, Control and Automation
content: Paper Publicationï¼š The accepted and registered papers of ICRCA 2021 will be published in International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM, which will be archived in the ACM Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science). The ISBN number of ICRCA 2021 conference proceedings is 978-1-4503-8748-4
